conversation_log.valor_response:
Hey! Would you mind sharing more details about the React component you're working on? That way I can give you better technical feedback or help address any specific challenges you're running into. Are you building something new or making modifications to an existing component?

Also - I can take a look at the actual workspace and component code if you want me to help optimize it or suggest improvements. Just let me know what you'd like me to focus on!
